This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participationBy 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participation.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, Turkish and refugee adolescents and youth have increased opportunities for participation, meaningful engagement and interaction with peers.

description.narrative: Partnerships with ministries, municipalities, and the South-East Anatolia Regional Development Administration enabled 85,721 adolescents and young people to participate in social cohesion activities. On the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the Convention on the Rights of the Child, the 20th Children's Forum was organised with the participation of all 81 Provincial Child Rights Committees (183 adolescents) and championed inclusivity and the fulfilment of rights for all adolescents. The Ombudsperson Institution received training and support enabling them to understand and better respond to child rights issues specifically affecting adolescents. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2020
